short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See New awesome photos of Earth

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get daily updates of new photos of Earth and get amazed by the natural beauty of Earth.

This Earth software extension scours the internet and gives you updated news on great photos of Earth, geography and much more

New posts which are related to earth photos are updated every 3-5 hours or so when you press the "Update Now" button.

To get the latest news for Earth Photos, you can simply press the "update" button and if there is more news, the article
links within our extension will change.

The photos you see are usually taken of nature and it allows you to see how majestic nature can be.
